videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure and    exposure compensation (-2.0 - +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
weight: Approx. 140 g (5.0 oz) (with battery    and SD memory card)
meteringmode: 256-segment matrix,    center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), spot (digital zoom 2x or more)
chargingtime: Approx. 2 h 20 min (when using    Charging AC Adapter EH-70P and when no charge remains)
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap, Rechargeable Li-ion    Battery EN-EL19 (with  battery case), Stylus TP-1, Charging AC Adapter EH-70P,    USB Cable  UC-E6, ViewNX 2 CD-ROM, Reference Manual (CD-ROM)
continuousshooting: Single (default setting),    Continuous (up to 6 pictures are  taken at a rate of about 0.9 fps), BSS (Best    Shot Selector),  Multi-shot 16
monitor: 7.5-cm (3-in.), approx. 460k-dot,    TFT LCD (touch panel) with antireflection coating, and 5-level brightness    adjustment
media: Internal memory (approx. 71 MB)    SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery    EN-EL19 (included) AC Adapter EH-62G (available separately)
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 s and 2 s
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 95.5 x 58.9 x 20.8 mm (3.8    x 2.4 x 0.9 in.) (excluding projections)
speed: 1/2000-1 s 4 s (when scene mode is    set to Fireworks show)
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 97% horizontal and 97%    vertical (compared to actual image)
focallength: 4.6-27.6mm (angle of view    equivalent to that of 26-156 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to    infinity, [T]: Approx.  1.0m (3 ft 4 in.) to infinity Macro mode: Approx. 5 cm    (2 in.) to  infinity (wide-angle position) (All distances measured from center    of  front surface of lens)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor    preflashes
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG Sound files    (Voice Memo): WAV Movies: AVI (Motion-JPEG compliant)
focusareaselection: Face priority, auto (9-area    automatic selection), center,  manual (focus area can be selected using the    touch panel), subject  tracking
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Chinese (Simplified and    Traditional), Czech,  Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek,    Hindi,  Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish,     Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Spanish,  Swedish,    Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 100% horizontal and 100%    vertical (compared to actual image)
shootingmodes: Auto, Scene (Scene auto selector,    Portrait, Landscape,  Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow,    Sunset, Dusk/dawn,  Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show,    Black and  white copy, Draw, Backlighting, Panorama assist, Pet portrait),     Special effects, Smart portrait
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent    to that of approx. 624 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
movie: HD 720p (default setting): 1280 x    720/16:9/approx. 30 fps,  VGA: 640 x 480/4:3/approx. 30 fps, QVGA: 320 x    240/4:3/approx. 30  fps
optionalaccessories: Battery Charger MH-66, AC Adapter EH-62G,    Audio Video Cable EG-CP14
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CCD; approx. 20.48    million total pixels
